posts.post_content:
I have two T206 Ty Cobbs for sale. 

* bat off SGC 30 Polar Bear - SOLD

* bat on SGC 30 Sweet Cap - $1,600

Make offers if you want, but offensively low ones will receive appropriate responses. 

-Ryan

I priced these too high, so I'm lowering the prices. Also, trying to include large scans of the bat off. New prices:

* bat off SGC 30 Polar Bear - SOLD

* bat on SGC 30 Sweet Cap - $1,350

You can email me at [url]ryan@cubanbaseballcards.com[/url]

-Ryan
